Description.Name: C.A.S.E. II (C)
Description.Details: CASE II is an experimental version of standard CASE. When an internal explosion occurs, CASE II reduces the damage to the Internal Structure of the installed location, making it take 10 points of damage instead of the full damage from the explosion. Clan-spec CASE II is lighter than the Inner Sphere version, weighing only half a ton instead of the IS version's full ton.
